project.name: build-tools
project.description:
This module is used as a place-holder for the static code analysis Tool RuleSets (PMD, Checkstyle, FindBugs). The Rules are present in the src/main/resource folder. These rules are based on the SAP LDI maven project archetype. These rules are a subset of the tool rule sets. Configuration of the maven plugins can be found in the official links:
https://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-pmd-plugin/examples/multi-module-config.html http://gleclaire.github.io/findbugs-maven-plugin/examples/multi-module-config.html https://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-checkstyle-plugin/examples/multi-module-config.html
